existing_features.title: Add a mission log history view in the frontend that displays all automated daily log entries with date, completed activities, and rewards earned

new_feature_requests.summary: AI should automatically add tasks and update mission log daily at 12am
Implement a daily timer mechanism that triggers at midnight (00:00:00 local time) to automatically generate new AI-recommended daily tasks
Create automated mission log entries at midnight that record daily activity summaries including completed tasks, missions accomplished, XP gained, and coins earned for that day
Enhance the AI task generation logic to consider user's historical completion patterns, time of day preferences, and previously completed tasks to provide more personalized daily recommendations
